javelin.model.unit.attack

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.attack.Attack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Attack
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Cloneable
    A single attack in an AttackSequence.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bonus
      Attack bonus as it appears on the XML data/stat block.
      int[] damage
      Format by index: 0d1+2
      boolean energy
      If changed to true will use energy resistance instead of damage reducton to absorb attack.
      int multiplier
      Number of times damage should be multiplied for in case of critical hit.
      java.lang.String name
      Attack description.
      Spell temporaryeffect
      Allols for overriding effect without having to deal with complex clean-up actions.
      int threat
      Critical hit range (usually only on a natural 20).
      boolean touch
      If true ignores armor class.

      • threat

        public int threat
        Critical hit range (usually only on a natural 20).

      • multiplier

        public int multiplier
        Number of times damage should be multiplied for in case of critical hit.

      • energy

        public boolean energy
        If changed to true will use energy resistance instead of damage reducton to absorb attack.
        See Also:
        Monster.energyresistance

      • temporaryeffect

        public Spell temporaryeffect
        Allols for overriding effect without having to deal with complex clean-up actions. Just set back to null once the new effect is over.

      • touch

        public boolean touch
        If true ignores armor class.
